highest number I can recall in my 32
year career
because of the the internet and the way
terrorists use social media including
from Syria
and the way we all live our lives using
their smartphones in our pockets the

secure apps and Internet communication

incite and direct terrorism amongst

shifts in technology and particularly in

and security agencies can no longer

content of communications between people
they have reason to believe a terrorists
we need to be able to monitor the

obtain other information about them but
through all this I think the important
thing to say is that we're focused on
the people who mean us harm we're not
about browsing through the private lives
of the citizens of this country we do
not have population scale monitoring
I think people would understand of
course the the work that we do most the
time must necessarily be secret and our

way but I think there is a role in
